queryMap.list_sql: SELECT CD_GROUP_ID, CD_GROUP_NM, CD_ID, CD_MEANING,PRICE,EXT1,EXT2, LOGIN_ID ,SORT_SEQ ,DATE_FORMAT( STR_TO_DATE(CD_ID, '%Y%m%d') ,'%m.%d') FISH_DAY FROM comm_info WHERE LOGIN_ID=? AND CD_GROUP_ID like 'FISH_TYPE' AND SUBSTR(CD_MEANING,1,6) = ifnull(?, date_format(now(), '%Y%m') ) ORDER BY CD_GROUP_ID,SORT_SEQ,CD_ID LIMIT 0, 50
queryMap.update_sql: UPDATE comm_info SET EXT1=? ,EXT2=? WHERE CD_GROUP_ID='FISH_TYPE' AND CD_ID=? AND LOGIN_ID=?
